FFlagProductInfoBatchingCoalescingEnable.purpose: Speeds up the process of finding and viewing items, making it more efficient for players.

FStringFlagRepoGitHashFastString.mechanism: Stores a fast string representation of the Git hash for quick access.
FStringFlagRepoGitHashFastString.purpose: Improves performance by speeding up version checks in the game.

DFFlagLoadTestingEnabled3_Staged.mechanism: Activates a new load testing feature in a controlled environment.
DFFlagLoadTestingEnabled3_Staged.purpose: Allows developers to test how their games perform under heavy load before going live.

FFlagAndroidTrimMemoryCounters.mechanism: Tracks memory usage on Android devices more efficiently.
FFlagAndroidTrimMemoryCounters.purpose: Helps reduce crashes and improve performance on mobile devices.

FFlagLuauTypeCheckerVectorLerp.mechanism: Enhances the type-checking capabilities for the Vector Lerp function in Luau.
FFlagLuauTypeCheckerVectorLerp.purpose: Provides better error checking for developers, making coding easier and reducing bugs.

FFlagSlimServiceEnableUploadsInNonEditMo.mechanism: Allows asset uploads even when not in edit mode, but in a test phase.
FFlagSlimServiceEnableUploadsInNonEditMo.purpose: Gives developers more flexibility to upload assets without needing to be in edit mode.

FFlagAXCategoryPillColorAnimationInstant.mechanism: Disables the color animation for category pills instantly.
FFlagAXCategoryPillColorAnimationInstant.purpose: Provides a smoother user experience by removing delays in color changes.

FFlagSduiSupportArrayParsing_Staged.mechanism: Enables parsing of arrays in the SDUI framework.
FFlagSduiSupportArrayParsing_Staged.purpose: Allows developers to use arrays more effectively, improving UI functionality.

DFIntBadgeServiceMaximumBadgeGetCount_Pl.mechanism: Sets a limit on the number of badges retrieved based on the place filter.
DFIntBadgeServiceMaximumBadgeGetCount_Pl.purpose: Improves performance by reducing the amount of data processed when fetching badges.

FFlagFCDecrementVertexCount.mechanism: Reduces the vertex count in 3D models.
FFlagFCDecrementVertexCount.purpose: Enhances game performance by making models less complex and easier to render.

DFFlagCLI169073.mechanism: Introduces changes to the command line interface for developers.
DFFlagCLI169073.purpose: Improves developer tools, making it easier to manage game development tasks.

FFlagRemoveiOS13DeprecatedCode.mechanism: Removes old code that is no longer needed for iOS 13 compatibility.
FFlagRemoveiOS13DeprecatedCode.purpose: Improves app performance and stability on iOS devices.

FFlagAXCatalogReactPerfIXPEnabledV3.mechanism: Enables a new version of the React framework for the catalog interface.
FFlagAXCatalogReactPerfIXPEnabledV3.purpose: Enhances the speed and responsiveness of the catalog for players.

FFlagSongbirdPopoverSubmenu2.mechanism: Introduces a new submenu design for the Songbird feature.
FFlagSongbirdPopoverSubmenu2.purpose: Provides a more user-friendly navigation experience for players.

FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.mechanism: Allows players to reconnect to the same game server after disconnection.
FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.purpose: Minimizes disruption and keeps players in their game sessions.

FFlagInitializeAutocompleteOnlyIfEnabled.mechanism: Activates the autocomplete feature only when it is turned on in settings.
FFlagInitializeAutocompleteOnlyIfEnabled.purpose: Ensures that players only see autocomplete suggestions when they want them.

FFlagFixEmoteWarningSize_Staged.mechanism: Adjusts the size of warning messages for emotes.
FFlagFixEmoteWarningSize_Staged.purpose: Improves visibility of emote warnings for players.

FFlagLuaAppFocusFixTopBanner.mechanism: Fixes focus issues with the top banner in the Lua app.
FFlagLuaAppFocusFixTopBanner.purpose: Enhances user experience by ensuring the banner is properly interactive.

FFlagAppChatFixPaddingWhenScaling_Staged.mechanism: Corrects padding in the chat interface when the app is resized.
FFlagAppChatFixPaddingWhenScaling_Staged.purpose: Ensures chat looks good and is usable on different screen sizes.

FFlagMediaPlaybackStopsWhenJoiningExperi.mechanism: Stops media playback when a player joins a new game.
FFlagMediaPlaybackStopsWhenJoiningExperi.purpose: Prevents distractions by pausing audio or video when entering a new experience.

FFlagLuauVectorLerp.mechanism: Implements a smoother transition for vector movements in scripts.
FFlagLuauVectorLerp.purpose: Allows for more fluid animations and movements in games.

FFlagFixKeyboardFocusInfiniteLoop_Staged.mechanism: Fixes a bug that causes the keyboard focus to get stuck in a loop.
FFlagFixKeyboardFocusInfiniteLoop_Staged.purpose: Ensures players can type without interruptions or issues.

FFlagFixTexturePackLoadingRetries_Staged.mechanism: Improves the way texture packs are loaded by retrying failed attempts.
FFlagFixTexturePackLoadingRetries_Staged.purpose: Reduces loading errors, allowing players to enjoy smoother graphics.

DFIntTextChatMessageClientReceivedThrott.mechanism: Limits the number of chat messages a player can receive in a short time.
DFIntTextChatMessageClientReceivedThrott.purpose: Prevents chat spam, making conversations clearer and more manageable.

FFlagPerformanceTelemetryHandleSpuriousW.mechanism: Improves performance tracking by filtering out unnecessary wake-up signals.
FFlagPerformanceTelemetryHandleSpuriousW.purpose: Enhances game performance, leading to a smoother experience for players.

FFlagReverbAbsorptionField.mechanism: Introduces a new sound effect that simulates how sound behaves in different environments.
FFlagReverbAbsorptionField.purpose: Creates a more immersive audio experience, making the game world feel more realistic.

FStringLuaOTATag.mechanism: Enables a specific string tag for Lua scripts to manage updates.
FStringLuaOTATag.purpose: Allows developers to easily identify and manage updates in their scripts.

FFlagFFlagIconHostSetZIndexToDefault.mechanism: Sets the default stacking order for icons in the UI.
FFlagFFlagIconHostSetZIndexToDefault.purpose: Ensures that icons appear in the correct order on the screen, improving visual clarity.

FFlagNewBindToMessageError_Staged.mechanism: Introduces a new method for handling error messages in the messaging system.
FFlagNewBindToMessageError_Staged.purpose: Enhances communication by providing clearer error messages to players.

FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm.mechanism: Removes the shortcut key for leaving a game during the confirmation prompt.
FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm.purpose: Prevents accidental game exits, ensuring players confirm their decision to leave.

FFlagAXAddStyleToItemCardPriceLine.mechanism: Adds new styling options to the price display on item cards.
FFlagAXAddStyleToItemCardPriceLine.purpose: Improves the visual appeal of item prices, making them more attractive to players.

FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToPymkCarouselClic.mechanism: Adds sorting data to the clicks on the recommended items carousel.
FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToPymkCarouselClic.purpose: Improves how recommended items are displayed based on user interactions.

FFlagAXAddOverlayFocusHandlerToPurchaseL.mechanism: Adds a focus handler for overlays in the purchase prompt.

FFlagDisableEtcFallback.mechanism: Disables fallback options for certain features.

FFlagCommunicationsFixLastInputMode.mechanism: Fixes how the last input mode is recorded during player interactions.
FFlagCommunicationsFixLastInputMode.purpose: Improves the accuracy of input detection, leading to a smoother gameplay experience.

FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Stag.mechanism: Enables version history tracking for places in a staged environment.
FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Stag.purpose: Allows players to access and revert to previous versions of a game, enhancing game management.

FFlagAXEnableCategoryPills4.mechanism: Introduces a new design for category navigation in the marketplace.
FFlagAXEnableCategoryPills4.purpose: Makes it easier for players to find and browse items by category, improving user experience.

FFlagAXMarketplaceCategoryPillTooltip.mechanism: Adds tooltips to category pills in the marketplace for additional information.
FFlagAXMarketplaceCategoryPillTooltip.purpose: Helps players understand what each category offers, aiding in item discovery.

FFlagEnableProfilePlatformDualCta_v5.mechanism: Implements dual call-to-action buttons on user profiles for better engagement.
FFlagEnableProfilePlatformDualCta_v5.purpose: Encourages players to interact more with profiles, enhancing social connectivity.

FFlagStudioActionsMultiplePayloads.mechanism: Allows multiple actions to be sent in one request to the studio.
FFlagStudioActionsMultiplePayloads.purpose: Improves performance and responsiveness when making changes in the studio.

FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadat.mechanism: Shortens the text displayed in the footer of experience tiles.
FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadat.purpose: Enhances visual clarity and prevents text overflow in the UI.

FFlagAXCategoryPillScrollToStart.purpose: Makes it easier for players to navigate through categories in the interface.

DFIntVoiceChatHttpErrorsTelemetryThrottl.purpose: Reduces server load and improves the reliability of voice chat features.

DFFlagWriteTombstoneAfterDynamicFetch_St.purpose: Helps in tracking and managing data more effectively for smoother gameplay.
